백준 Silver1 - 단지번호붙이기

by Jung Jaeeun

February 14, 2021
in Problem-solving

백준 2667번

풀이

from collections import deque

n = int(input())
graph = []
for _ in range(n):
    tmp = [int(x) for x in input()]
    graph.append(tmp)
total_cnt = 0
res = []

dx = [-1, 1, 0, 0]
dy = [0, 0, -1, 1]


def bfs(x, y, graph):
    global total_cnt, res
    if graph[x][y] == 0:
        return
    total_cnt += 1
    cnt = 0
    q = deque([(x, y)])
    graph[x][y] = 0
    while q:
        x, y = q.popleft()
        cnt += 1
        for i in range(4):
            nx, ny = x+dx[i], y+dy[i]
            if 0 <= nx < n and 0 <= ny < n and graph[nx][ny] == 1:
                graph[nx][ny] = 0
                q.append((nx, ny))
    res.append(cnt)


for i in range(n):
    for j in range(n):
        bfs(i, j, graph)
res.sort()

print(total_cnt)
print(*res, sep='\n')
Tags: python, coding-test, programmers, boj, baekjoon
